artist: Artist: Ogata Gekkō; Publisher: Takegawa Risaburō
creditline: Gift from the collection of Edith and the late John Payne
description: horizontal chūban; small book with brown silk over; cream-colored vertical band with Japanese characters in center; small, brown specks on pastedown and free end paper; colored images on inner pages depicting meeting and battle scenes; blank accordion pages on back side
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: Set of all 12 chūban prints from Sino-Japanese War, Great Japanese Victory Sugoroku (Nisshin sensō, Nippon dai shōri sugoroku 日清戦争　日本大勝利雙六) bound in an album.
title: Album of 12 pictures from "Sino-Japanese War, Great Japanese Victory Sugoroku"
